thread.title: 19 Pictures That Prove The Bigger The Dog, The Better
thread.title_full: 19 Pictures That Prove The Bigger The Dog, The Better

author: Natalya Lobanova
title: 19 Pictures That Prove The Bigger The Dog, The Better
text:
View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683658 2. Seriously, instead of getting a bed for your little dog, just get a bigger dog. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @mollythenewfie A classic money-saving hack.
ID: 10683712 3. And everyone else is an excellent chair for them. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683672 4. They also make excellent blankets. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10683737 5. Unfortunately, they sometimes outgrow even human-sized furniture. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683752 6. They might look scary, but they’re all friendly giants. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683704 7. The benefit of them being so big is that they can cuddle two humans at once. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683673 8. Though a lot of the bigness does tend to be 50% fluff. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683773 9. They’re our equals. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683706 10. And they’re the best cuddle partners. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683709 11. They’re the guardians of all things little and precious. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @ralphie_the_newf_and_the_boss ID: 10683711 12. And they’re the cutest way of getting a great upper body workout. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @whaler_the_bernese ID: 10683714 13. They occasionally serve as an excellent mode of transport. View this image › 
imgur.com Unfortunately only for little dogs and little humans, not full-sized adult humans.
ID: 10683727 14. Even when they’re little, they’re still big. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683736 15. They can be as portable as little dogs! View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683747 16. Their dedication to pretending to be lap-dogs can be a little impractical, at times. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683750 17. But they make wonderful dance partners. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683771 18. They’re just big, fluffy babies. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10683742 19. Who are not entirely aware of just how big they are. View this image ›

Natalya Lobanova is junior staff writer at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
